00036 #include <stdio.h>
00037 #include <stdlib.h>
00038 #include <stdarg.h>
00039 #include "midas.h"
00040 #include "../mscb/mscb.h"
00041 
00042 /*---- globals -----------------------------------------------------*/
00043 
00044 /* MSCB node address / channel mapping */
00045 
00046 typedef struct {
00047    char device[256];
00048    int *mscb_address;
00049    unsigned char *mscb_index;
00050    int *var_size;
00051 } MSCBDEV_SETTINGS;
00052 
00053 typedef struct {
00054    MSCBDEV_SETTINGS mscbdev_settings;
00055    INT fd;
00056    INT num_channels;
00057 } MSCBDEV_INFO;
00058 
00059 /*---- device driver routines --------------------------------------*/
00060 
00061 void addr_changed(HNDLE hDB, HNDLE hKey, void *arg)
00062 {
00063    INT i, status;
00064    MSCB_INFO_VAR var_info;
00065    MSCBDEV_INFO *info;
00066 
00067    info = (MSCBDEV_INFO *) arg;
00068 
00069    /* get info about MSCB channels */
00070    for (i = 0; i < info->num_channels; i++) {
00071       status = mscb_info_variable(info->fd, info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_address[i],
00072                                   info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_index[i], &var_info);
00073       if (status == MSCB_SUCCESS) {
00074          if (var_info.flags & MSCBF_FLOAT)
00075             info->mscbdev_settings.var_size[i] = -1;
00076          else
00077             info->mscbdev_settings.var_size[i] = var_info.width;
00078       } else
00079          info->mscbdev_settings.var_size[i] = 0;
00080    }
00081 }
00082 
00083 /* the init function creates a ODB record which contains the
00084    settings and initialized it variables as well as the bus driver */
00085 
00086 INT mscbdev_init(HNDLE hkey, void **pinfo, INT channels, INT(*bd) (INT cmd, ...))
00087 {
00088    int status, size;
00089    HNDLE hDB, hsubkey;
00090    MSCBDEV_INFO *info;
00091 
00092    /* allocate info structure */
00093    info = calloc(1, sizeof(MSCBDEV_INFO));
00094    *pinfo = info;
00095    info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_address = calloc(channels, sizeof(INT));
00096    info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_index = calloc(channels, sizeof(INT));
00097    info->mscbdev_settings.var_size = calloc(channels, sizeof(INT));
00098 
00099    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00100 
00101    /* create settings record */
00102    size = sizeof(info->mscbdev_settings.device);
00103    info->mscbdev_settings.device[0] = 0;
00104 
00105    status =
00106        db_get_value(hDB, hkey, "Device", &info->mscbdev_settings.device, &size,
00107                     TID_STRING, TRUE);
00108    if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
00109       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00110 
00111    size = sizeof(INT) * channels;
00112    db_get_value(hDB, hkey, "MSCB Address", info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_address, &size,
00113                 TID_INT, TRUE);
00114    db_find_key(hDB, hkey, "MSCB Address", &hsubkey);
00115    size = sizeof(INT) * channels;
00116    db_set_data(hDB, hsubkey, info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_address, size, channels,
00117                TID_INT);
00118    db_open_record(hDB, hsubkey, info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_address, size, MODE_READ,
00119                   addr_changed, info);
00120 
00121    size = sizeof(BYTE) * channels;
00122    db_get_value(hDB, hkey, "MSCB Index", info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_index, &size,
00123                 TID_BYTE, TRUE);
00124    db_find_key(hDB, hkey, "MSCB Index", &hsubkey);
00125    size = sizeof(BYTE) * channels;
00126    db_set_data(hDB, hsubkey, info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_index, size, channels, TID_BYTE);
00127    db_open_record(hDB, hsubkey, info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_index, size, MODE_READ,
00128                   addr_changed, info);
00129 
00130    /* initialize info structure */
00131    info->num_channels = channels;
00132 
00133    info->fd = mscb_init(info->mscbdev_settings.device, 0, FALSE);
00134    if (info->fd < 0) {
00135       cm_msg(MERROR, "mscbdev_init", "Cannot connect to MSCB device \"%s\"",
00136              info->mscbdev_settings.device);
00137       return FE_ERR_HW;
00138    }
00139 
00140    /* read initial variable sizes */
00141    addr_changed(0, 0, info);
00142 
00143    return FE_SUCCESS;
00144 }
00145 
00146 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00147 
00148 INT mscbdev_exit(MSCBDEV_INFO * info)
00149 {
00150    mscb_exit(info->fd);
00151 
00152    /* free info structure */
00153    if (info) {
00154       free(info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_address);
00155       free(info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_index);
00156       free(info->mscbdev_settings.var_size);
00157       free(info);
00158    }
00159 
00160    return FE_SUCCESS;
00161 }
00162 
00163 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00164 
00165 INT mscbdev_set(MSCBDEV_INFO * info, INT channel, float value)
00166 {
00167    INT value_int;
00168 
00169    if (info->mscbdev_settings.var_size[channel] == -1) {
00170       /* channel is "float" */
00171       mscb_write(info->fd, info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_address[channel],
00172                  info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_index[channel], &value, sizeof(float));
00173    } else {
00174       /* channel is int */
00175       value_int = (INT) value;
00176       mscb_write(info->fd, info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_address[channel],
00177                  info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_index[channel], &value_int,
00178                  info->mscbdev_settings.var_size[channel]);
00179    }
00180 
00181    return FE_SUCCESS;
00182 }
00183 
00184 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00185 
00186 INT mscbdev_get(MSCBDEV_INFO * info, INT channel, float *pvalue)
00187 {
00188    INT size, value_int;
00189 
00190    if (info->mscbdev_settings.var_size[channel] == -1) {
00191       size = sizeof(float);
00192       mscb_read(info->fd, info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_address[channel],
00193                 info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_index[channel], pvalue, &size);
00194    } else {
00195       /* channel is int */
00196       size = info->mscbdev_settings.var_size[channel];
00197       value_int = 0;
00198       mscb_read(info->fd, info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_address[channel],
00199                 info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_index[channel], &value_int, &size);
00200       *pvalue = (float) value_int;
00201    }
00202 
00203    return FE_SUCCESS;
00204 }
00205 
00206 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00207 
00208 INT mscbdev_get_default_name(MSCBDEV_INFO * info, INT channel, char *name)
00209 {
00210    int status;
00211    MSCB_INFO_VAR var_info;
00212 
00213    status = mscb_info_variable(info->fd, info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_address[channel],
00214                                info->mscbdev_settings.mscb_index[channel], &var_info);
00215    if (status == MSCB_SUCCESS)
00216       strcpy(name, var_info.name);
00217 
00218    return status;
00219 }
00220 
00221 /*---- device driver entry point -----------------------------------*/
00222 
00223 INT mscbdev(INT cmd, ...)
00224 {
00225    va_list argptr;
00226    HNDLE hKey;
00227    INT channel, status;
00228    DWORD flags;
00229    float value, *pvalue;
00230    void *info, *bd;
00231 
00232    va_start(argptr, cmd);
00233    status = FE_SUCCESS;
00234 
00235    switch (cmd) {
00236    case CMD_INIT:
00237       hKey = va_arg(argptr, HNDLE);
00238       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00239       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00240       flags = va_arg(argptr, DWORD);
00241       bd = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00242       status = mscbdev_init(hKey, info, channel, bd);
00243       break;
00244 
00245    case CMD_EXIT:
00246       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00247       status = mscbdev_exit(info);
00248       break;
00249 
00250    case CMD_SET:
00251       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00252       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00253       value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);   // floats are passed as double
00254       status = mscbdev_set(info, channel, value);
00255       break;
00256 
00257    case CMD_GET:
00258       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00259       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00260       pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00261       status = mscbdev_get(info, channel, pvalue);
00262       break;
00263 
00264    case CMD_GET_DEFAULT_NAME:
00265       /*
00266          info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00267          channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00268          name = va_arg(argptr, char *);
00269          status = mscbdev_get_default_name(info, channel, name);
00270        */
00271       break;
00272 
00273    default:
00274       break;
00275    }
00276 
00277    va_end(argptr);
00278 
00279    return status;
00280 }
